articles.content: The most auspicious tribute to Newcastle inadvertently came in Carlo Ancelottis scathing assessment of a dreadful Everton display. They showed more spirit, more fighting spirit, they showed more conc… [+4106 chars]

articles.author: Michael Lynch
articles.title: ‘We were robbed’: Rudan fumes as Western denied by VAR - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Western United coach Mark Rudan said his team was “robbed” after having two goals disallowed on Saturday night. Now he could face censure for anti-VAR talk.
articles.content:
We dropped two points should never have, an angry Rudan, whose mood had not been improved after watching his star striker Alessandro Diamanti also hit the woodwork twice in the closing minutes.
Refe… [+5160 chars]
